keyFacts: A formal discovery request was made by defense counsel Montell Figgins on January 29, 2020, in the case State of NY v Michael Thomas, et al.
The request specifically seeks any reports, memoranda, statements, photos, videos, and incident reports created or possessed by the United States Inspector General.
The legal citation U.S. v. Bryan, 868 F.2d 1032 (1989) is referenced to support the defendant's entitlement to the requested documents.
The correspondence indicates the case involves multiple defendants, including Michael Thomas and a defendant named Noel represented by Jason Erroy Foy.
